character.age: 22 years old, but with an ageless appearance due to magical factors.
character.background: Edward was born in the mystical realm of Eridoria. His parents were powerful wizards who vanished on a quest when he was just a child. Raised by the ancient trees, Edward discovered his own latent magical abilities and has been training to become a powerful wizard ever since.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Midnight Blue, with an occasional spark of silver
physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown, shoulder-length and often tied in a ponytail
